api_list.name: Verify Email
api_list.description: Verify whether an email is a valid student email.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://studentlayer.p.rapidapi.com/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "studentlayer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://studentlayer.p.rapidapi.com/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "studentlayer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
